changes:
Version: v1.0.0

• Initial public release of NDC EUP Renamer.
• Automatic backup of the pack root before any changes.
• Department + sex-based sorting (LSPD/BCSO/etc, male/female).
• Smart item-type detection for components and props.
• Consistent model naming with preserved _u/_r suffix.
• Texture renaming to <item>_diff_XXX_a_uni style.
• Overflow handling when indices exceed the configured max.
• Log + HTML/Markdown summary report generation.
• Light/dark theme toggle and NEP-styled UI.
• Footer links to Discord, Website, Patreon, and GitHub.
• Built-in update checker with changelog tab.
